verses.verse: ( Carry One Another’s Burdens) Ἀδελφοί <WG80> Adelphoi Brothers , ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if καὶ <WG2532> kai - προλημφθῇ <WG4301> prolēmphthē is caught ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos someone ἔν <WG1722> en in τινι <WG5100> tini a παραπτώματι <WG3900> paraptōmati trespass , ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you οἱ <WG3588> hoi who are πνευματικοὶ <WG4152> pneumatikoi spiritual καταρτίζετε <WG2675> katartizete should restore τὸν <WG3588> ton - τοιοῦτον <WG5108> toiouton him ἐν <WG1722> en with πνεύματι <WG4151> pneumati a spirit πραΰτητος <WG4240> prautētos of gentleness . σκοπῶν <WG4648> skopōn [But] watch σεαυτόν <WG4572> seauton yourself , μὴ <WG3361> mē or καὶ <WG2532> kai also σὺ <WG4771> sy you πειρασθῇς <WG3985> peirasthēs may be tempted .

Ἀλλήλων <WG240> Allēlōn one another’s τὰ <WG3588> ta - βάρη <WG922> barē burdens , βαστάζετε <WG941> bastazete Carry καὶ <WG2532> kai and οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs in this way ἀναπληρώσετε <WG378> anaplērōsete you will fulfill τὸν <WG3588> ton the νόμον <WG3551> nomon law τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou of Christ .

εἰ <WG1487> ei If γὰρ <WG1063> gar - δοκεῖ <WG1380> dokei thinks τις <WG5100> tis anyone εἶναί <WG1510> einai he is τι <WG5100> ti something μηδὲν <WG3367> mēden nothing , ὤν <WG1510> ōn when he is φρεναπατᾷ <WG5422> phrenapata he deceives ἑαυτόν <WG1438> heauton himself .

Τὸ <WG3588> To - δὲ <WG1161> de - ἔργον <WG2041> ergon work . ἑαυτοῦ <WG1438> heautou his own δοκιμαζέτω <WG1381> dokimazetō should test ἕκαστος <WG1538> hekastos Each one καὶ <WG2532> kai - τότε <WG5119> tote Then εἰς <WG1519> eis in ἑαυτὸν <WG1438> heauton himself μόνον <WG3441> monon alone , τὸ <WG3588> to - καύχημα <WG2745> kauchēma reason to boast ἕξει <WG2192> hexei he will have καὶ <WG2532> kai and οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not εἰς <WG1519> eis in τὸν <WG3588> ton - ἕτερον <WG2087> heteron someone else .
ἕκαστος <WG1538> hekastos each one γὰρ <WG1063> gar For τὸ <WG3588> to - ἴδιον <WG2398> idion his own φορτίον <WG5413> phortion load . βαστάσει <WG941> bastasei should carry

Κοινωνείτω <WG2841> Koinōneitō must share δὲ <WG1161> de Nevertheless , ὁ <WG3588> ho the one who κατηχούμενος <WG2727> katēchoumenos receives instruction τὸν <WG3588> ton in the λόγον <WG3056> logon word τῷ <WG3588> tō with [his] κατηχοῦντι <WG2727> katēchounti instructor . ἐν <WG1722> en in πᾶσιν <WG3956> pasin all ἀγαθοῖς <WG18> agathois good things

Μὴ <WG3361> Mē Do not πλανᾶσθε <WG4105> planasthe be deceived : Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God οὐ <WG3756> ou is not μυκτηρίζεται <WG3456> myktērizetai to be mocked . ὃ <WG3739> ho Whatever γὰρ <WG1063> gar - ἐὰν <WG1437> ean . . . σπείρῃ <WG4687> speirē sows , ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos a man τοῦτο <WG3778> touto vvv καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv θερίσει <WG2325> therisei he will reap in return .

ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - ὁ <WG3588> ho The [one] σπείρων <WG4687> speirōn who sows εἰς <WG1519> eis to please τὴν <WG3588> tēn - σάρκα <WG4561> sarka flesh , ἑαυτοῦ <WG1438> heautou his ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τῆς <WG3588> tēs the σαρκὸς <WG4561> sarkos flesh θερίσει <WG2325> therisei will reap φθοράν <WG5356> phthoran destruction ; ὁ <WG3588> ho the [one] δὲ <WG1161> de but σπείρων <WG4687> speirōn who sows εἰς <WG1519> eis to please τὸ <WG3588> to the Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit , ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos Spirit θερίσει <WG2325> therisei will reap ζωὴν <WG2222> zōēn life . αἰώνιον <WG166> aiōnion eternal

Ἐμοὶ <WG1473> Emoi as for me , δὲ <WG1161> de But μὴ <WG3361> mē I never γένοιτο <WG1096> genoito may καυχᾶσθαι <WG2744> kauchasthai boast , εἰ <WG1487> ei except μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the σταυρῷ <WG4716> staurō cross τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn of our Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ , δι’ <WG1223> di’ through οὗ <WG3739> hou which ( Or through whom) ἐμοὶ <WG1473> emoi to me , κόσμος <WG2889> kosmos [the] world ἐσταύρωται <WG4717> estaurōtai has been crucified κἀγὼ <WG2504> kagō and I κόσμῳ <WG2889> kosmō [to the] world .

οὔτε <WG3777> oute neither γὰρ <WG1063> gar For περιτομή <WG4061> peritomē circumcision τί <WG5100> ti anything . ἐστιν <WG1510> estin means οὔτε <WG3777> oute nor ἀκροβυστία <WG203> akrobystia uncircumcision ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla [What counts is] καινὴ <WG2537> kainē a new κτίσις <WG2937> ktisis creation .
